resources.string: This app made for making search for benefactors and send them text messages or emails to convince them to donate money or food or medicines for charity associations, to help jobless or destitute or poor people who are suffering during acual COVID-19 pandemy. You can search for benefactors by entering the locals that are profited during the COVID-19 pandemic by selling a lot of products, for example search for "Pharmacy" in a specific region or department.

Search for benefactors by entering the local names such as "Pharmacy" or "Supermarket", after search done, the server displays a list of locals with their details such as phone number, email, etc, to use these informations to call for donation.
